name: df-pi1
body: |- wceq(cpi1, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, cuni(cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s0), comi, cv(s1)), cqus, cfv(cphtpc, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the fundamental group, whose operation is given by concatenation of homotopy classes of loops. Definition of [Hatcher] p. 26. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
